Package org.tp

Class Db

java.lang.Object
org.tp.Db
public class Db extends Object
A service class used to get data from a database

  • Constructor Details

    • Db

      public Db​(String host, String port, String dbName, String user, String password)
      Generate the connexion variable to access database data If the database informations are not valid or the JDBC class is not found an exception is thrown
      Parameters:
      host - the ip on which the database is hosted
      port - the port that is open for the database
      dbName - the database name
      user - the database username
      password - the database password related to the user
      See Also:
      SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, DriverManager

      Returns:
      the boat with the specified name

      public ResultSet getBoatsName()
